string-array.name: tr_false
string-array.item: Android is an open-source operating system:
Android developers require some tools and this requirement is satisfied by “Android SDK”:
Java is not the widely used language for Android development:
Using Linux kernel, Android provides a connection between the other layers of the software:
HAL does not provides an interface between device drivers and API framework:
Android has an Intent class when the user has to navigate from one activity to another:
Implicit Intent invoke the Activity class:
Explicit Intents calls the system components:
ANR stands for Application Not Responding:
